phrases.phrase: 땡 하는 소리가 날 때까지, 오븐을 열면 안 돼.
meanings: 요리에 관한 표현 Don't open the oven door until the chime sounds.

examples.korean: She was born deaf and dumb. 발음듣기 그녀는 날 때부터 농아였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was born deaf and dumb. 발음

examples.korean: She was born deaf. 발음듣기 그녀는 날 때부터 귀가 들리지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
He was blind from birth. 발음듣기 그는 날 때부터 앞을 보지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was blind from birth. 발음

examples.korean: Her brother was born blind. 발음듣기 그녀의 오빠[남동생]는 날 때부터 앞을 보지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her brother was born blind. 발음

examples.korean: Mark has been blind from birth. 발음듣기 마크는 날 때부터 맹인이었다[앞을 보지 못했다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Mark has been blind from birth. 발음
